dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
AutoDetectedBrowser: Internet Explorer 8

IssueType: lr_circumvention
Language: en
agree: checked
circumvention_additional_comments: From: Kricket
Date: 12/29/2011 9:53:33 PM
To: undisclosed-recipients
Subject: [kkkreationstuts] Creating for a Cause!!! Coming Soon!! January  
13-15, 2012









Hello Friends!!

Our next Creating for a Cause event-- starts January 13th!! And runs  
through until the 15th!
With the added bonus of 14 EXTRA days to win and receive great raffle  
prizes donated to the event by wonderful donors and supporters!! With daily  
raffle draws and a full weekend of offers and guaranteed items as well as  
exclusive tutorials..its gonna be too much fun to not get involved

January 13, 14, 15th, 2012 we will be holding our 3rd  "Creating for a  
Cause" weekend to help "Embracing Kenya's Children"
Go to our Blog and read more http://creating-for-a-cause.blogspot.com/
We have had more creators joining, more grab bag goodies and more tutorials  
donated!!
Its going to be spectacular!

So what is Creating for a Cause and how can you help and at the same time  
BE SPOILED?!?
Subscribers will not only get to give the gift of security and love to  
children in Kenya, Africa --BUT~ you will also have a chance at a fabulous  
Grand Gift Giveaway-- which includes a One year Membership to ACFC Members  
Site (which I am donating) and many more items from personalized sets,  
goodie bags, trial memberships to other sites, gift certificates to PTU  
tube sites..and much more!
Our Fall event had 36 Guest Creators and we expect just as many to join us  
again, as well as some new faces!!
(this number will continue to grow as we get closer to the event date....so  
check the Blog daily for new Creators as they get added to the Guest List..)
Each Guest Creator will make - guaranteed personalized tags, and  
personalized letters AS WELL AS well known tutorial writers who will also  
be donating--exclusive tutorials written special for the event.
You will receive a guaranteed amount of 4 Items PER Creator!! (Fall  
participants enjoyed AT LEAST 144 guaranteed personalized items!!! Each!!)  
PLUS some Exclusive Tutorials written by some generous tut writers special  
for those that join the event!
(at least 15 Tutorials included in your donation)
We also have a few *New* goodies for Creators--A CFAC Creators Grab  
Bag--which will include exclusive items just for the event  
donors--Patterns, Templates, Masks, Textures, Tubes and other goodies--a  
priceless grab bag exclusive only to Creating for a Cause donors!)
And that's not all!! -- through the weekend event there is even MORE!!
Creators will offer up items for request, play games for items, have  
quickie requests open, mystery items to request...and much more!!
We will have SEVERAL Giveaway Draws!! All throughout the weekend for Gift  
Certificates and Prizes!
And then after the weekend--its not over yet!!!
There will be a daily raffle draw for the remaining 14 days!!! (so even  
more chances at great prizes, goodies and much more)

What happens to the $$ I donate?
Each gift made will go directly to the Kenya Mission and used to bless and  
love on these precious African children.
We will be able to "see" our donations at work with pictures from Kenya  
provided by a member of the mission trip!!
Together we can make a difference, Creating for a Cause--Embracing Kenya's  
Children~One Mission at a Time

How do I Gift the Cause now?
You can either visit our Blog page and click on the Gift Link at the top  
Right of the Page
http://creating-for-a-cause.blogspot.com/
Or - You can choose one of the Gift amounts below.
For every Gift (of $5 over the minimum gift amount of $25) - you get one  
more Ticket for the Giveaways!!
And Grand Giveaway!
The more $ you give to the cause--the more raffle tickets you receive and  
up your chances at getting your hands on these fantastic daily prizes, as  
well as the Grand Prize Gift Package!!

To Give the Basic Gift Amount of $25 click HERE
To Gift the Basic Gift Amount PLUS $5 (gives you 2 Raffle Tickets) click  
HERE  ($30)
To Gift the Basic Gift Amount PLUS $10 (gives you 3 Raffle Tickets) click  
HERE ($35)
To Gift the Basic Gift Amount PLUS $15 (gives you 4 Raffle Tickets) click  
HERE ($40)
To Gift the Basic Gift Amount PLUS $20 (gives you 5 Raffle Tickets) click  
HERE ($45)
To Gift the Basic Gift Amount PLUS $25 (gives you 6 Raffle Tickets) click  
HERE ($50)
For Higher Gift amounts $55 (7 tickets) HERE ::$60 (8 tickets) HERE ::$65  
(9 tickets) HERE ::$70 (10 tickets) HERE ::$75 (11 tickets) HERE ::$80 (12  
tickets) HERE ::$85 (13 Tickets) HERE ::$90 (14 tickets) HERE  ::$95 (15  
tickets) HERE ::and $100  (16 tickets) HERE
If you wish to Gift an amount not listed - just send us an e-mail and let  
us know. We are here to help!
Info.creating.for.a.cause@gmail.com

What's in it for me?
And if that isn't exciting enough--there's more---At the end of the weekend  
we will do a draw for the Grand Gift Giveaway! Which will be made up of  
donations by our Guest Creators and the community of PSP lovers. We have  
some wonderful donations from Scrapping Goodies, Miss Jenn Designs,  
Sunflower Friends, Trina Clark, Digi Web Studios, Tooshtoosh, Gorjuss, Kay  
Miller Designs, Dollar Graphics Depot, Sarah's Pixel World, MZH Designs  
Members Site, ACFC Members Site, Blanca's Members Site, MORE personalized  
goodies, gift certificates to other Paid to Use Tube and graphic stores  
online...the value of the Grand Gift Giveaway will be well over $200  
bucks!!! Worth the Gift !!

How can I help and how much can I give?
We do not have a "set" amount for Gifts. However, Gifts will start at  
$25.00 and you will have the option to Gift more if you choose.
Anyone who Gifts above the standard Gift of $25 will get an extra entry  
into the draws for every $5 dollars over that you Gift (so someone who Gift  
$35 would get 3 entries into the draws..)
We will have the Grand Gift Giveaway drawn at the end of the event and have  
a second place and third place as well as a Mystery Gift for the person who  
Gifted the highest amount toward the event. You will also have 14 MORE  
chances to win a prize during the following two weeks after the main  
weekend event.
TOGETHER we can do so much more than on our own.
Personally I don't think one can ever out give God. But with our talents,  
time and efforts--we can in some small way give back to the precious  
children of the world and let them know that we do care!!

All right--I'm in--How can I join?
If you would like to be a part of the Creating for a Cause weekend - please  
go to the blog and subscribe.
http://creating-for-a-cause.blogspot.com/
If the Gift amount you wish to give is not listed under the "Gift " amount  
on the far right side at the top of the Blog--you may contact us and we  
will send you an invoice in the amount of your choosing.
Send an e-mail to info.creating.for.a.cause@gmail.com with your Pay Pal  
address and the amount you wish to Gift .
Or to send payment in another form, e-mail for details on where to send  
your Gift.
The event will take place on January 13, 14 and 15th, 2012
Even if you can't participate in the weekend event because of holiday or  
other commitments---you can still join and get the Guaranteed items!
So you will not miss out if you can't be with us that weekend.
At the end of the weekend event the draw will be made for the Grand Gift  
Giveaway and other Goodies will also be awarded.
Trust me -- the Grand Gift Giveaway and secondary goodies make it worth the  
money you Gift times a hundred

I Gifted..now what?
Once you have made your Gift you will be invited to the Creating for a  
Cause Yahoo group.
That is where we will spend out weekend event sending out goodies and  
having fun!
Please also join our Facebook Page and Click "Like" to follow us/join us on  
Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Creating-for-a-Cause/198085840237558?v=wall

Would you like to be a Guest Creator?
If you would like to volunteer to be a Guest Creator for the event.
Please send an e-mail to info.creating.for.a.cause@gmail.com
And we will send you the information on what is required of you as a guest  
creator.
Don't be shy--come and join us and donate your time and talents to a good  
cause!!

If you have any questions, or would like to join or be one of our Guest  
Creators..you may contact the Admin team anytime!!
admin-team-creating-for-a-cause-events-owner@yahoogroups.com

We are here to help and get you involved!

Who can I contact if I have questions?
Our admin team consists of:
April (ACFC), Carrie G, Marianne, and Kricket
You can reach us at  
admin-team-creating-for-a-cause-events-owner@yahoogroups.com or come check  
out the Blog for more info.
http://creating-for-a-cause.blogspot.com/

Who are the Guest Creators for this event?
You can see a list of who is already on the team to Guest Create on the  
Right Side of the Blog.
We have some pretty amazing creators joining the team and we are very  
excited to be working together for this cause.
Thank you for taking the time to read about Creating for a Cause--Embracing  
Kenya's Children~One Mission at a Time.

We sure hope to have you at the event on January 13, 14 and 15th, 2012
A great way to start off the new year!!

Feel free to tell your friends and get the word out!!
Contact us or Gift today--and get ready for an amazing event!
http://creating-for-a-cause.blogspot.com/

P.S. If you refer a friend - tell them to mention you referred them--and  
you will receive 1 extra raffle ticket for each person you have referred!
Have them check out the Blog or give us a shout!
The more that get involved the better!!
It's sure to have something for everyone! Creators and those who love  
Personalized goodies!

This event is just as much focused on giving Creators a bunch of goodies as  
it is about the Personalized items! So truly something for everyone!!!
Hope to see you there. And thanks for getting the word out!
The children appreciate your help! As do all of us!
******************************************************************************************
Much thanks,
April, Carrie G, Marianne, and Kricket
Creating for a Cause Administration Team

circumvention_injured: No I havent because I know the owner of the blog is  
a thief and liar. I am copying and pasting one of the emails (with header),  
I have received by a member of CFAC in the additional comments box.
circumvention_what_product: This, Creating for a Cause (CFAC), group is  
stealing money from donors. they claim they are taking donations for a  
charity called ~Embracing Kenya's Children~One Mission at a time~
That is not a true charity. I have tried to find it by googling it and by  
asking them for a link on their facebook page.  
http://www.facebook.com/pages/Creating-for-a-Cause/198085840237558
Less than a minute after I posted the question it was taken off the wall.  
But I pressed my print screen button to capture my question. I have that  
saved. Also when a donor presses the "buy now" button you are redirected to  
a paypal account that is not in the name of CFAC or the "charity" they  
are "rasing" money for. It is in the name of ACFC. ACFC is a paid members  
website owned by the blog owner/founder of CFAC  April Hunt.
I have dealt with April Hunt many times. I belonged to her ACFC members  
group but was kicked out when I disagreed with her. And she did not give me  
my money back until I threatened to take her to court. Her group CFAC has  
had other benefits to raise money that went into her account. I have  
contacted the FTC, the BBB,FBI, Yahoo, their ISP provider, the canadian  
anti-fraud center (April hunt lives in Alberta, canada). And few more  
places. There are quite a few of us who want her stopped. She is stealing  
the money of hard working people. On her cfac blog she states that they are  
not a charity so no one can get a receipt for their donation. That is not  
true. If they are asking you to donate money for a 'cause' they are a  
charity and they have to register with the Canadian and US government.  And  
CFAC states  "Please do not request to see any of the administration's  
personal banking information." That is against the law! If someone makes a  
donation they have the right to ask for bank statements so they can see  
where there money is going.
CFAC offers no proof on their blog that a charity even exists. In an email  
sent by one of the members of CFAC they state...."We will be able to "see"  
our donations at work with pictures from Kenya provided by a member of the  
mission trip!!" Pictures? I can get pictures online of children in Kenya.  
That is not proof! Like I said I have a lot of information I would love to  
send you if possible. I have April Hunts address and I.D's from yahoo.
I am asking to please check them out before they have another "benefit" and  
steal more money.



circumvention_what_ways: Like I said above this does not have anything to  
do with circumvention or service. You do not have a scam or fraud button to  
push so I had to push another button just to send you the information that  
you need!
companyname:
country_residence: US
full_name: Tena A Troy
represented_copyright_holder_circumvention: Myself and others who are  
trying to put a stop to CFAC
url_box_circumvention_1: http://creating-for-a-cause.blogspot.com/
